name: Lenovo 41U3074 Wired Laser Mouse
Features: [2000 dpi resolution (user selectable to 1600, 800, or 400 dpi), Fully programmable tilt wheel and buttons, Ambidextrous design for both right and left-handed usage, Full-speed USB, Full-featured Lenovo Mouse Suite, Exclusive soft-to-the-touch metallic black finish]
